recommendations.item_metadata: [{"category":["CDs & Vinyl","Rock","Rock Guitarists"],"description":["If you thought that Chris Rea's reasonably priced 11 CD boxset called Blue Guitars, featuring over 130 songs, was a bit too much to take in at one time, then this two CD distillation might be more your style. Here, the best 22 tracks from the box are compiled on two CDs for your sampling pleasure. Includes 'Where the Blues Come From', 'The Soul of My Father's Shadow', 'Lucky Day', 'Who Killed Love' and more. Edel."],"title":"Blue Guitar: A Collection of Songs","brand":"Chris Rea","rank":"128,725 in CDs & Vinyl (","asin":"B000NIVOTU","imageURLHighRes":["https:\/\/images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/51D09DmCOFL.jpg"],"details":{"Audio CD":"(March 30, 2007)","Number of Discs:":"2","Label:":"Edel Europe","ASIN:":"B000NIVOTU"}}]

[{"category":["CDs & Vinyl","Pop"],"description":["Republic Records will be releasing The Hunger Games: Mockingjay, Part 2 Original Motion Picture Soundtrack on 11\/23 (digitally) and 12\/4 (physically).
